author: When can Malaysians expect Transparency in IT spend
content: [...] I’m also disappointed that the full AGs findings are not published on-line for everyone to see. To me, every Request For Information, Request For Proposal, Tender and Signed Contract should be in the public sphere and posted on-line for taxpayers to see. We may not be interested, but for the sake of transparency this information needs to be revealed so that someone somewhere can analyse the data without bias and publish them for public consumption, similar to what the UK citizens did when analysing the expense claims of their Members of Parliament. [...]
